This is a simple flexdashboard. By using the flexdashboard template it is already set up in a simple three chart layout. One main chart and two subcharts.

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
# Packages
library(flexdashboard)
library(shiny)
library(tidyverse)

# Data Import
diamonds <- diamonds
```
